did.unittitle: Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers invoice
did.abstract: The collection contains one invoice from 1903 for catering an event at the Flushing Institute in Flushing, Long Island. The invoice includes a list of menu items served at the event. The Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers had locations in Brooklyn and Manhattan.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Immediate source of acquisition is unknown. Collection was accessioned in 1985.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Maresi Company Confectioners and Caterers had locations in Brooklyn (30 Clinton Street; 76 Seventh Avenue) and Manhattan (719 Sixth Avenue; 589 Madison Avenue; 320 Columbus Avenue).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Maresi Company invoice, 1903, 1985.028; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains one invoice from 1903 for catering an event at the Flushing Institute in Flushing, Long Island. The invoice includes a list of menu items served at the event.
